data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There were two reasons I requested using 'JOAP' as the namespace:

    1) In parallel with 'SOAP' and friends. 'JOAP' is at a similar
    level of abstraction as SOAP.

    2) Because JOAP is a fairly large package and has within it some
    deeply-nested module names of its own.

    This package uses Net::Jabber and XML::Streams, but it's not part
    of the distribution of those packages.
